cluster_information.name: Content Launcher
cluster_information.description: Provides an interface for launching content on a Video Player device such as a Streaming Media Player, Smart TV or Smart Screen.

attributes.name: AcceptHeader
attributes.description: This list provides list of content types supported by the Video Player or Content App in the form of entries in the HTTP 'Accept' request header.

attributes.name: SupportedStreamingProtocols
attributes.description: This attribute provides information about supported streaming protocols.
